name: part_001
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs 'Do My Best' and reveals her new 3D costume during the 4th-anniversary live.
Performance of 'Sorairo Days' with high-energy singing and choreography.

subtitles.original: ぐるぐるきらり 100文字のテンション プリアテンション プリ
subtitles.english: Spinning and shining, 100-character tension, please attention, please

subtitles.original: キラキラのぼり Volume Max でいこう！
subtitles.english: Sparklingly rising, let's go at Max Volume!

subtitles.original: 単純で限界ないエモーション あたふたしてる
subtitles.english: Simple and boundless emotion, being flustered

subtitles.original: これからも目一杯さ
subtitles.english: From now on too, to the very fullest

subtitles.original: 仲良くよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Let's get along well!

subtitles.original: まだまだ まだ
subtitles.english: More and more, still more

subtitles.original: あとどれくらい
subtitles.english: How much longer?

subtitles.original: そんな明日を
subtitles.english: Towards that tomorrow

subtitles.original: 目指していこう
subtitles.english: Let's keep aiming

subtitles.original: もう一歩 Do my best!
subtitles.english: One more step, do my best!

subtitles.original: お星様に
subtitles.english: To the stars

subtitles.original: お願い事
subtitles.english: I make a wish

subtitles.original: 早く隣に並べますように
subtitles.english: I hope I can stand beside you soon

subtitles.original: 冷めないように
subtitles.english: So it doesn't cool down

subtitles.original: 魔法をかけて
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell

subtitles.original: ワクワクがバクバクしちゃいそう！
subtitles.english: My excitement feels like it's going to burst!

subtitles.original: みんなー！騒げーーー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Make some noise!

subtitles.original: 今気付いちゃったんだ 本当のところは
subtitles.english: I just realized it now, to tell the truth

subtitles.original: 次のページのことだよ I can be...
subtitles.english: It's about the next page, I can be...

subtitles.original: 楽しみすぎるから さっとこの続きに
subtitles.english: Because I'm looking forward to it so much, straight to the sequel

subtitles.original: せーので飛び込んじゃおう！
subtitles.english: Let's dive in together!

subtitles.original: だから Do my best, Do my best テンションはじけて
subtitles.english: So Do my best, Do my best, tension bursting

subtitles.original: きらりこっち向いて プリ アテンション プリ
subtitles.english: Sparklingly look this way, please attention, please

subtitles.original: ドキドキのぼり Volume Max でいこう！
subtitles.english: Heart pounding and rising, let's go at Max Volume!

subtitles.original: 泣いちゃって笑っちゃって エモーション あたふたして
subtitles.english: Crying and laughing, emotion, being flustered

subtitles.original: この今を目一杯さ 楽しんでいこうよ！
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy this moment to the very fullest!

subtitles.original: まだまだ まだ止まれない そんな世界に大好き宣言
subtitles.english: I still can't stop yet, a declaration of love to such a world

subtitles.original: 声に出して Do my best!
subtitles.english: Say it out loud, do my best!

subtitles.original: 合言葉は…
subtitles.english: The keyword is...

subtitles.original: Do my best!
subtitles.english: Do my best!

subtitles.original: 大空スバル4周年！4th Anniversary Live 始まるよ！
subtitles.english: Oozora Subaru 4th Anniversary! The 4th Anniversary Live is starting!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がっていくぞーーー！！
subtitles.english: Let's get fired up!!

subtitles.original: 君は聞こえる? 僕のこの声が
subtitles.english: Can you hear it? This voice of mine

subtitles.original: 闇に虚しく 吸い込まれた
subtitles.english: Was swallowed up in vain into the darkness

subtitles.original: もしも世界が 意味を持つなら
subtitles.english: If the world had a meaning

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちも 無駄ではない
subtitles.english: Then even these feelings wouldn't be in vain

subtitles.original: 憧れに押しつぶされて あきらめてたんだ
subtitles.english: I was crushed by my longings and had given up

subtitles.original: 果てしない空の色も 知らないで
subtitles.english: Without even knowing the color of the endless sky

subtitles.original: 走り出した想いが今でも
subtitles.english: The feelings that started to run, even now

subtitles.original: この胸を確かに 叩いているから
subtitles.english: Are certainly beating within my chest

subtitles.original: 今日の僕が その先に続く
subtitles.english: The me of today will go on beyond that

subtitles.original: 僕らなりの明日を 築いていく
subtitles.english: And build a tomorrow that's uniquely ours

subtitles.original: 答えはそう いつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer is, yes, it's always right here

subtitles.original: 過ぎた季節を 嘆く暇はない
subtitles.english: There's no time to grieve for the seasons gone by

subtitles.original: 二度と迷って しまわぬように
subtitles.english: So that I never get lost again

subtitles.original: 数え切れない ほんの些細な
subtitles.english: Countless, truly trivial...

subtitles.original: そんな後悔 抱えたまま
subtitles.english: ...regrets like those, while clutching them

subtitles.original: その背中だけ追いかけて ここまで来たんだ
subtitles.english: I've come this far just chasing after that back

subtitles.original: 探していた 僕だけにできること
subtitles.english: Searching for what only I can do

subtitles.original: あの日くれた 言葉が今でも
subtitles.english: The words you gave me that day, even now

subtitles.original: この胸に確かに 届いているから
subtitles.english: Are certainly reaching into my chest

subtitles.original: 昨日よりも 今日僕は僕の
subtitles.english: Even more than yesterday, today I...

subtitles.original: 生まれてきた理由に 気付いていく
subtitles.english: ...am realizing the reason I was born

subtitles.original: 答えはそう いつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer is, yes, it's always right here
